def PrepareIndependentVariables(df):
    # Use other columns as independent variables
    # Validate for null values
    if df.isnull().sum().any():
        print('Null value found. Stopping.')
        return None
    return df.iloc[:, 1:-1]

import pandas as pd
def WriteSummary(model_summary):
    # Write summary to 'Logistic.xlsx'
    pd.DataFrame({'Model Summary': [model_summary]}).to_excel('Logistic.xlsx', index=False)
